WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=75111
 
Using Excel5 reader it is not possible to read an xls file that has a workbook protection password to prevent the user from moving/creating new sheet etc.
 
Test:
----
$excel = PHPExcel_IOFactory::load('read.xls');
$worksheet = $excel->getActiveSheet();
 
Expected result:
----
The file is read with no errors
 
Actual result:
----
Exception: Cannot read encrypted file in C:\xampp\htdocs\_phpexcel\PHPExcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Reader\Excel5.php on line 998
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.1
WorkItem.Summary: Read Excel file with workbook protection password (Excel5 reader)

Comments.Message: TODO: Find out how to solve this. Records in xls file get encrypted as soon as one sets a workbook protection password from MS Office Excel. OpenOffice.org 3.1.1 can read the file so there must be a solution.

Hi, I am in the planned of Using PHPEXCEL in my project. Before that I would like to know one information. Whether this issue is still resides. PHPExcel 1.7.9, we cannot read the excel file with password protected?
This isssue is still an issue. We have no idea at present on the encryption/key handling used by Excel
